title: Does the 2017 tax plan eliminate the deduction for losses from forest fires and other natural disasters?
subtitle: :: Reversed against the proposed abolition of the deduction of personal losses due to natural disasters with the outbreak of forest fires in southern California.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The Tax and Job Reductions Act 2017 calls for the elimination or substantial reduction of personal losses caused by forest fires and other natural disasters.
